LocaleSwitcher.label: Change language
LocaleSwitcher.locale: {locale, select, th {th Thai} en {us English} other {Unknown}}

StartPage.header: Recycle to earn Rewards for PET Plastic
StartPage.step_one: Press the “Start’ button on the screen to begin.
StartPage.step_two: Insert PET plastic bottles ONCE Item at a time.
StartPage.step_three: Press the “Finish” button and confirm to end process.
StartPage.step_four: Select your option with Donate point or Collecting Point.
StartPage.step_five: Input your phone number member to get points and exchange them for rewards.

Dashboard.sub_header: Insert ONCE Item at a time
